sentence: Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry said he believes there is inherent inequality in the current system.
author: Daniel Bice
title: Bice: U.S. Senate candidate Mandela Barnes favors eliminating cash bail nationally, aide says

sentence: A Marquette University Law School survey released earlier this month showed Barnes leading the Democratic field of candidates, with 23 percent support, followed by Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry at 13 percent support.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Barnes posts $1.7M first quarter number in Wisconsin Senate race
